frozen.name: xfe
frozen.shortDescription: X File Explorer (Xfe) is an MS-Explorer like file manager for X.
frozen.longDescription:
X File Explorer (Xfe) is an MS-Explorer like file manager for X.
It is based on the popular, but discontinued, X Win Commander, which was developed by Maxim Baranov.
Xfe aims to be the filemanager of choice for all the Unix addicts!
